verses.verse: They <S%H559>say<s%>, If a <S%H376>man<s%> put <S%H7971>away<s%> his <S%H802>wife<s%>, and she <S%H1980>go<s%> from <S%H312>him<s%>, and become another <S%H376>man<s%>'s, shall he return unto her <S%H7725>again<s%>? shall not that <S%H776>land<s%> be <S%H2610>greatly<s%> <S%H2610>polluted<s%>? but you have played the <S%H2181>prostitute<s%> with <S%H7227>many<s%> <S%H7453>lovers<s%>; yet return <S%H7725>again<s%> to <S%H5002>me<s%>, says the <S%H3068>Lord<s%>.

Lift <S%H5375>up<s%> your <S%H5869>eyes<s%> unto the high <S%H8205>places<s%>, and <S%H7200>see<s%> <S%H375>where<s%> you have not been <S%H7693>lain<s%> <S%H1870>with<s%>. In the ways have you <S%H3427>sat<s%> for <S%H6163>them<s%>, as the Arabian in the <S%H4057>wilderness<s%>; and you have <S%H2610>polluted<s%> the <S%H776>land<s%> with your <S%H2184>whoredoms<s%> and with your <S%H7451>wickedness<s%>.

Therefore the <S%H7241>showers<s%> have been <S%H4513>withheld<s%>, and there has been no latter <S%H4456>rain<s%>; and you had a <S%H2181>whore<s%>'s <S%H4696>forehead<s%>, you <S%H3985>refused<s%> to be <S%H3637>ashamed<s%>.
Will you not from this time <S%H7121>cry<s%> unto <S%H1>me<s%>, My father, you are the <S%H441>guide<s%> of my <S%H5271>youth<s%>?

Will he <S%H5201>reserve<s%> his anger for <S%H5769>ever<s%>? will he <S%H8104>keep<s%> it to the <S%H5331>end<s%>? <S%H1696>Behold<s%>, you have spoken and <S%H6213>done<s%> evil <S%H7451>things<s%> as you <S%H3201>could<s%>.

The <S%H3068>Lord<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> also unto me in the <S%H3117>days<s%> of <S%H2977>Josiah<s%> the <S%H4428>king<s%>, Have you <S%H7200>seen<s%> that which <S%H4878>backsliding<s%> <S%H3478>Israel<s%> has <S%H6213>done<s%>? she is gone <S%H1980>up<s%> upon every <S%H1364>high<s%> <S%H2022>mountain<s%> and <S%H8478>under<s%> every <S%H7488>green<s%> <S%H6086>tree<s%>, and there has played the <S%H2181>prostitute<s%>.

And I <S%H559>said<s%> <S%H310>after<s%> she had <S%H6213>done<s%> all these <S%H7725>things<s%>, Turn you unto <S%H7725>me<s%>. But she returned <S%H901>not<s%>. And her treacherous <S%H269>sister<s%> <S%H3063>Judah<s%> saw <S%H7200>it<s%>.

And I <S%H7200>saw<s%>, when for all the <S%H182>causes<s%> by which <S%H4878>backsliding<s%> <S%H3478>Israel<s%> committed <S%H5003>adultery<s%> I had put her <S%H7971>away<s%>, and <S%H5414>given<s%> her a <S%H5612>bill<s%> of <S%H3748>divorce<s%>; yet her <S%H898>treacherous<s%> <S%H269>sister<s%> <S%H3063>Judah<s%> <S%H3372>feared<s%> <S%H3212>not<s%>, but went and played the prostitute <S%H2181>also<s%>.

And it came to pass through the <S%H6963>lightness<s%> of her <S%H2184>whoredom<s%>, that she <S%H2610>defiled<s%> the <S%H776>land<s%>, and committed <S%H5003>adultery<s%> with <S%H68>stones<s%> and with <S%H6086>stocks<s%>.

And yet for all this her <S%H901>treacherous<s%> <S%H269>sister<s%> <S%H3063>Judah<s%> has not <S%H7725>turned<s%> unto me with her whole <S%H3820>heart<s%>, but <S%H8267>feignedly<s%>, <S%H5002>says<s%> the <S%H3068>Lord<s%>.

And the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> unto <S%H4878>me<s%>, The backsliding <S%H3478>Israel<s%> has <S%H6663>justified<s%> <S%H5315>herself<s%> more than <S%H898>treacherous<s%> <S%H3063>Judah<s%>.

<S%H1980>Go<s%> and <S%H7121>proclaim<s%> these <S%H1697>words<s%> toward the <S%H6828>north<s%>, and <S%H559>say<s%>, <S%H7725>Return<s%>, you <S%H4878>backsliding<s%> <S%H3478>Israel<s%>, <S%H5002>says<s%> the <S%H3068>Lord<s%>; and I will not cause my <S%H6440>anger<s%> to <S%H5307>fall<s%> upon <S%H2623>you<s%>: for I am merciful, <S%H5002>says<s%> the <S%H3068>Lord<s%>, and I will not <S%H5201>keep<s%> anger for <S%H5769>ever<s%>.

Only <S%H3045>acknowledge<s%> your <S%H5771>iniquity<s%>, that you have <S%H6586>transgressed<s%> against the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> your <S%H430>God<s%>, and have <S%H6340>scattered<s%> your <S%H1870>ways<s%> to the <S%H2114>strangers<s%> under every <S%H7488>green<s%> <S%H6086>tree<s%>, and you have not <S%H8085>obeyed<s%> my <S%H6963>voice<s%>, <S%H5002>says<s%> the <S%H3068>Lord<s%>.

<S%H7725>Turn<s%>, O <S%H7726>backsliding<s%> <S%H1121>sons<s%>, <S%H5002>says<s%> the <S%H3068>Lord<s%>; for I am <S%H1166>married<s%> unto <S%H3947>you<s%>: and I will take you <S%H259>one<s%> of a <S%H5892>city<s%>, and <S%H8147>two<s%> of a <S%H4940>family<s%>, and I will <S%H935>bring<s%> you to <S%H6726>Zion<s%>:
And I will <S%H5414>give<s%> you <S%H7462>pastors<s%> according to my <S%H3820>heart<s%>, which shall <S%H7462>feed<s%> you with <S%H1844>knowledge<s%> and <S%H7919>understanding<s%>.

And it shall come to <S%H7235>pass<s%>, when you be multiplied and <S%H6509>increased<s%> in the <S%H776>land<s%>, in those <S%H3117>days<s%>, <S%H5002>says<s%> the <S%H3068>Lord<s%>, they shall <S%H559>say<s%> no <S%H727>more<s%>, The ark of the <S%H1285>covenant<s%> of the <S%H3068>Lord<s%>: neither shall it <S%H5927>come<s%> to <S%H3820>mind<s%>: neither shall they <S%H2142>remember<s%> <S%H6485>it<s%>; neither shall they visit <S%H6213>it<s%>; neither shall that be made any more.

At that <S%H6256>time<s%> they shall <S%H7121>call<s%> <S%H3389>Jerusalem<s%> the <S%H3678>throne<s%> of the <S%H3068>Lord<s%>; and all the <S%H1471>nations<s%> shall be <S%H6960>gathered<s%> unto <S%H8034>it<s%>, to the name of the <S%H3068>Lord<s%>, to <S%H3389>Jerusalem<s%>: neither shall they <S%H3212>walk<s%> any more <S%H310>after<s%> the <S%H8307>imagination<s%> of their <S%H7451>evil<s%> <S%H3820>heart<s%>.

In those <S%H3117>days<s%> the <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H3063>Judah<s%> shall <S%H3212>walk<s%> with the <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%>, and they shall <S%H935>come<s%> <S%H3162>together<s%> out of the <S%H776>land<s%> of the <S%H6828>north<s%> to the <S%H776>land<s%> that I have given for a <S%H5157>inheritance<s%> unto your <S%H1>fathers<s%>.

But I <S%H559>said<s%>, How shall I <S%H7896>put<s%> you among the <S%H1121>sons<s%>, and <S%H5414>give<s%> you a <S%H2532>pleasant<s%> <S%H776>land<s%>, a <S%H6643>good<s%> <S%H5159>heritage<s%> of the <S%H6635>hosts<s%> of <S%H1471>nations<s%>? and I <S%H559>said<s%>, You shall <S%H7121>call<s%> <S%H1>me<s%>, My father; and shall not turn <S%H7725>away<s%> from <S%H310>me<s%>.

<S%H403>Surely<s%> as a <S%H802>wife<s%> <S%H898>treacherously<s%> departs from her <S%H7453>husband<s%>, so have you dealt <S%H898>treacherously<s%> with <S%H1004>me<s%>, O house of <S%H3478>Israel<s%>, <S%H5002>says<s%> the <S%H3068>Lord<s%>.

A <S%H6963>voice<s%> was <S%H8085>heard<s%> upon the high <S%H8205>places<s%>, <S%H1065>weeping<s%> and <S%H8469>supplications<s%> of the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%>: for they have <S%H5753>perverted<s%> their <S%H1870>way<s%>, and they have <S%H7911>forgotten<s%> the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> their <S%H430>God<s%>.

<S%H7725>Return<s%>, you <S%H7726>backsliding<s%> <S%H1121>sons<s%>, and I will <S%H7495>heal<s%> your <S%H4878>backslidings<s%>. <S%H857>Behold<s%>, we come unto <S%H3068>you<s%>; for you are the Lord our <S%H430>God<s%>.

<S%H403>Truly<s%> in <S%H8267>vain<s%> is salvation hoped for from the <S%H1389>hills<s%>, and from the <S%H1995>multitude<s%> of <S%H2022>mountains<s%>: <S%H403>truly<s%> in the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> our <S%H430>God<s%> is the <S%H8668>salvation<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%>.

For <S%H1322>shame<s%> has <S%H398>devoured<s%> the <S%H3018>labor<s%> of our <S%H1>fathers<s%> from our <S%H5271>youth<s%>; their <S%H6629>flocks<s%> and their <S%H1241>herds<s%>, their <S%H1121>sons<s%> and their <S%H1323>daughters<s%>.

We lie <S%H7901>down<s%> in our <S%H1322>shame<s%>, and our <S%H3639>confusion<s%> <S%H3680>covers<s%> <S%H2398>us<s%>: for we have sinned against the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> our <S%H430>God<s%>, we and our <S%H1>fathers<s%>, from our <S%H5271>youth<s%> even unto this <S%H3117>day<s%>, and have not <S%H8085>obeyed<s%> the <S%H6963>voice<s%> of the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> our <S%H430>God<s%>.
